get_low_battery_devices.name: Get Low Battery Devices
get_low_battery_devices.description: Returns a formatted list of devices below the battery threshold. The service returns a dictionary with a 'result' field containing a multi-line string with one device per line in format: 'name (area) - battery_level%'. Use this in automations with response_variable to access the formatted list.
